title: -695 RP!
body: Can I please have a refund? II think it may be glitched! -695 RP! This happened after I bought Ekko and went to buy his skin, after realizing that I have -695RP I sadly could not do this! Please help meh!

replies.body: can i get my shaco skin and pay for my rp later like this guy i dont mind having negative rp

Hey izacis, 

As Valkyrie Witch has mentioned, logging out and logging back in should fix this issue - these types of bugs tend to be visual.
